org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.predicates

Class Predicate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.predicates.Predicate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PredicateAny, PredicateFrom, PredicateNone, PredicateNotFrom, PredicateNotType, PredicateType

    public abstract class Predicate
extends Object
    Predicates are used to select events from the deferred queue. This class is abstract and must be extended when writing a new predicate. Some standard predicates are provided.
    The idea of simulation predicates was copied from SimJava 2.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Marcos Dias de Assuncao
    See Also:
    PredicateType, PredicateFrom, PredicateAny, PredicateNone, Simulation

    • Constructor Detail

      • Predicate

        public Predicate()

    • Method Detail

      • match

        public abstract boolean match(SimEvent event)
        The match function which must be overridden when writing a new predicate. The function is called with each event in the deferred queue as its parameter when a Simulation.select() call is made by the user.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to test for a match.
        Returns:
        The function should return true if the event matches and should be selected, or false if it does not match the predicate.
